metrics.name: Average FIRST Ready for Review to LAST Closed cycle time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
   )

metrics.name: Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
   )

metrics.name: Average To Do to Closing cycle time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))))
   )

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

blocks.text: 1. Nice to have attributes showing the "People" working on the tickets. Don't need to name, We need to know how many people have worked on the tickets. We can't now calculate how many people
2. Nice to see the flow group by the Epics (Now is by Tickets)

3. If not "go-life" ticket, we have no "Last Epic" information as it's now shown "Null". Last Epic is Null if creation date is smaller than the extraction date (like in 2020) Add "Labels", "Priority", "Epic Name" to Attributes would be helpful for us to see the connections between tickets --> Suggest to add "Item Field" into the ETL pipeline final output table
4.  For "Flagging", nice to have "comment" information as additional information on "Why" do we flag the ticket.

dataSource.query:
SELECT distinct event_name, count(case_id) as "count tickets"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY 2 desc

children.name: Q4 - tickets closed per week and epic

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) as "# of Tickets", 
DATE_PART('hour',(SELECT FIRST("end_time") 
FILTER (WHERE event_name = 'Create Issue'))) AS "Ticket Creation Hour"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue')
ORDER BY 2

children.name: When do we start reviewing Tickets?

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) as "# of Tickets", 
DATE_PART('hour',(SELECT FIRST("end_time") 
FILTER (WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Review'))) AS "Hour"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review')
ORDER BY 2

children.name: When do we finish working on Tickets?

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) as "# of Tickets", 
DATE_PART('hour',(SELECT FIRST("end_time") 
FILTER (WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Ready for Review'))) AS "Hour"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review')
ORDER BY 2

SELECT count(case_id) as "# of Tickets", 
DATE_PART('hour',(SELECT FIRST("end_time") 
FILTER (WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed'))) AS "Hour"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Closed')
ORDER BY 2

SELECT count(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name IN('Assign Reviewer')) < 1 AND "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done') 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Copy of Tickets closed without Reviewer

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done') 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 

count(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Unflag Issue'))
-- / count(case_id)

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer' ) < 1 AND "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done')
    / count(case_id) FILTER (WHERE "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done') *100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cases w. Creation to To Do > 30 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
count(case_id) FILTER( WHERE
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	> DURATION '30days') 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Average time from ticket creation to starting work
children.description: Time the issue is created until first time 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Correlation between "Create => Close" and "In Progress => Ready for Review"
children.description: "Create => Close" is correlated with "In Progress => Ready for Review" with a correlation coefficient of 0.61

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Create => Close", "In Progress => Ready for Review" 
FROM 
	(SELECT 
    	(SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
         FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to Closed')) 
        	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
        	   FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create Issue')) as "Create => Close"
                , 
                (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
                 FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to Ready for Review'))
                -
                (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
                 FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to In Progress')) as "In Progress => Ready for Review" 
      FROM "defaultview-217" 
      WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) 
      	AND (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
        	 FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to Closed')) 
        - 
        (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
         FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Create Issue')) 
         IS NOT NULL 
         AND 
         (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
          FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to Ready for Review'))
          -
          (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
           FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Change Status to In Progress')) 
           IS NOT NULL) as sq TABLESAMPLE EXACT(100 ROWS) REPEATABLE(1676297397885)

children.name: Time from creation to in progress

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to To Do' ~> ('Change Status to In Progress'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Step 2 ( In Progress -> Ready for Review)

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Progress' ~> ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> ('Change Status to In Review'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Assign Reviewer')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Ready for Review' ~> ('Assign Reviewer'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Step 5 (Assign Reviewer -> Change Status to In Review)

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Assign Reviewer'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Assign Reviewer' ~> ('Change Status to In Review'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

children.name: Step 6 (Change Status to In Review -> Close)

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer')) AS "Month when Reviewer added",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
		 WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')
        )
      	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
      	   WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))
    ) AS "Duration"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to In Review' ~> ('Change Status to Closed'))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DISTINCT(event_name) AS "Events", count(case_id)
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
order by 2 desc

children.name: development time (in prog to ready for review) per quarter
development time (in prog to ready for review) per month
Average time from ticket creation to starting work over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Month", 
AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to In Progress')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Issue')))
as "Taking to Progress" FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Cases w. Creation to To Do > 10 days  over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Day", COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to To Do')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Issue')) > DURATION '10days')
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('DAY'), NULL

children.name: Average FIRST Ready for Review to LAST Closed cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM( 
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to Closed') 
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress')
    ) 
FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES (
    'Change Status to In Progress' ~> 'Change Status to Closed') 
    AND "ResolutionStatus" NOT IN ('Done'))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Bugs and how long it takes to start working on them

dataSource.query:
SELECT

 DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) AS "Issue Creation Date",


AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Create Issue'))))
   ) AS "CT Start working on it"


FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE IssueType = 'Bug' AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

AND (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', "IssueCreated") >= DATE '2021-09-01' AND DATE_TRUNC('DAY', "IssueCreated") <= DATE '2099-12-31') AND ((SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-06-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2099-06-30')

ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Bugs and how long it takes to start working on them

dataSource.query:
SELECT

COUNT(Case_id) AS "Number of bug tickets",
 DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) AS "Issue Creation Date",


AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Create Issue'))))
   ) AS "CT Start working on it"


FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE IssueType = 'Bug' AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

AND (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', "IssueCreated") >= DATE '2021-09-01' AND DATE_TRUNC('DAY', "IssueCreated") <= DATE '2099-12-31') AND ((SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) >= DATE '2022-06-01' AND (SELECT FIRST (DATE_TRUNC('DAY', END_TIME))) <= DATE '2099-06-30')

ORDER BY 2 ASC NULLS FIRST
--FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Anomaly in "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" where "IssueType" is "Bug"
children.description: Metric "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" is 7.66% lower than mean where "IssueType" is "Bug"

dataSource.query:
SELECT "IssueType", AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
   ) AS "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500

children.name: Anomaly in "Average cycle time" where "IssueType" is "Bug"
children.description: Metric "Average cycle time" is 30.73% lower than mean where "IssueType" is "Bug"

dataSource.query: SELECT "IssueType", AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time)) - (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) AS "Average cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) as Month,
    count(case_id) as "# Bugs"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "IssueType" = 'Bug'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

dataSource.query:
SELECT "IssueType", AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))))
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (

   ) AS "Average LAST Ready for Review to LAST In Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500

SELECT COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 1 )
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) 
WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 0 )
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
"LastEpic" ,
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) 
WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 0 ) as "Count",

COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 1 )
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) 

WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 0 )
* 100 as "Rework"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 3 DESC, 2 DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
case_id ,"Title" ,"IssueType" , "LastEpic" ,
COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
WHERE  event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress'  )
as "Count of reworks"
/*
COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 1 )
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) 

WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to In Progress' ) > 0 )
* 100 as "Rework"*/
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY 5 DESC
LIMIT 10

blocks.text: Rework:
Not all "Reworks" are bad
Some Epics are done quickly but have Rework due to "Onboarding"

children.name: Average time from ticket creation to starting work
children.description: Time the issue is created until first time 'In Progress'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')

children.name: Tickets took more than 1 day from Backlog to "To Do"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
counts
FROM (SELECT count(case_id) as "counts" , 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Backlog'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
	) AS "Avg. Cycle Time for tickets in Backlog to To Do"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Backlog' ~> 'Change Status to To Do')
) as selections
WHERE "Avg. Cycle Time for tickets in Backlog to To Do" > DURATION '1day'
LIMIT 10

children.name: Ratio of cases w. <2 days in Backlog

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
count(case_id) FILTER(WHERE
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue'))
	< DURATION '2days') 
/ 
count(case_id) FILTER(WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Change Status to To Do') >0)
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT case_id AS "CaseId",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Backlog'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
	) AS "Avg. Cycle Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Backlog' ~> 'Change Status to To Do')
ORDER By 2 DESC
LIMIT 5

children.name: Average time from ticket creation to starting work over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Month", 
AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Status to In Progress')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Issue')))
as "Taking to Progress" FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Issue' ~> 'Change Status to In Progress')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST

children.name: Avg. Cycle Time for tickets in Backlog to To Do

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id AS "CaseId",
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Backlog'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))
	) AS "Avg. Cycle Time for tickets in Backlog to To Do"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Status to Backlog' ~> 'Change Status to To Do')
ORDER By 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

blocks.text: Backlog:
Initially almost 20 days to get a ticket from backlog to start to work on it
Bugs are critical, we still need on average 7 days (ideally ASAP) , if we look at the time distribution, it is getting better now might be due to "more workforce NOW"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) AS "Create => In Progress",

	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))) AS "In Progress => Ready for Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))) AS "Ready for Review => In Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))) AS "In Review => Closed"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) /
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) * 100 AS "Create => In Progress",

	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))
    - (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))) / 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) * 100 AS "In Progress => Ready for Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))
    - (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))) / 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) * 100 AS "Ready for Review => In Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))) / 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) * 100 AS "In Review => Closed"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

includes: Change Status to Ready for Review

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	event_name AS Variant,
    count(1) AS "Number of Cases",
    
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) AS "Create => In Progress",
	
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) / 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Issue')))) * 100 AS "%Create => In Progress",

	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress')))) AS "In Progress => Ready for Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review')))) AS "Ready for Review => In Review",
        
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to Closed')))
    - (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review')))) AS "In Review => Closed"

FROM THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY 2 DESC 
LIMIT 5

children.name: development time (in prog to ready for review) per quarter
development time (in prog to ready for review) per month
Time from creation to in progress

blocks.text: H1: The number of closed tickets goes up towards the end of the engineering quarter
Answer: No. The distribution is roughly even, no peak to be seen at Feb / May / Aug / Nov.
H2: the missing peak is related to larger tickets.
Answer: there is no indication of this, as the ticket duration is not going up. Ticket duration is higher in the beginning of the quarter (assumption: q planning)

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name IN('Assign Reviewer')) < 1 AND "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done') 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT count(event_name) WHERE event_name = 'Assign Reviewer' ) < 1 AND "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done')
    / count(case_id) FILTER (WHERE "ResolutionStatus" = 'Done') *100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: Flagging:
Best practices for "Flagging" a ticket / Create a dummy user for external reviewer
For "Flagging", nice to have "comment" information as additional information on "Why" do we flag the ticket.

children.name: AVG TIME Flagging grouped by IssueType

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Unflag Issue')) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Flag Issue'))), "IssueType"
as "Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Flag Issue' ~> 'Unflag Issue')
GROUP BY 2

SELECT 
AVG(
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	 	WHERE event_name IN ('Unflag Issue'))
    - 	(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
       	WHERE event_name IN ('Flag Issue'))
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Flag Issue' ~> 'Unflag Issue')

blocks.text: - Hourly Analysis ->  Rethink Focus time?
- Closing: Tickets closed without Review -> Should we track this separately?
- Time from Creation to To Do: 3/4 Tickets go into To Do in < 2 days -> Rethink how we use Backlog and To Do?
- To be checked: Was there a dip in Q4 in productivity because we onboarded so many people?
